channel.title: Making a server (HELP!)
channel.description:
Well, i have a mac.
Hybridscape works fine if i just want to play and use commands built in, not if i want to make it my own.
Cuz most tutorials use client.java, hybridscape doesn't have client.java.
So i downloaded another source and it only has a .bat file.
since i have a mac i cant run .bat files. so how do i make a .jar file out of all of those source files and stuff?
PLZ HELP PLZ HELP PLZ

item.title: Making a server (HELP!)

Do you know any?
